data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Endruweit, Marco, Yang, Junxing, Liu, Shuwei (2016): A new river loach from the main channel of the upper Mekong in Yunnan (Cypriniformes: Nemacheilidae). Zootaxa 4168 (3): 594-600, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4168.3.13|30 occurrences
